string.value: #b#p2020005##k told me to see #b#p2041023##k in the passage of time of Ludibrium to get #b#t4031470##k.

#b#p2041023##k said #b#t4031473##k is behind one of the doors in the twisted corridor. However, he said he lost the key while being chased by the gate keeper....\r\n#i4031473##t4031473# #b#c4031473#/1
I returned the key back to #b#p2041023##k.

Magician #b#p2041023##k's performance will continue as long as #m220000000#'s clock ticks! ...you're not here to see #b#p2041023##k's magic? What are you looking for? \r\n#L0# I'm looking for #b#o9300086#.#l
Do you want to see #b#o9300086##k? Why do you want to see him? I can't allow you to go in as he is dangerous. \r\n#b#L0# I'm working on element-based magic with #p2020005#.#l

Studying element-based magic with #b#p2020005##k? It can't be wrong if he said that. I saw #r#o9300086##k in #b#m922020100##k for sure. I have a key for that place. Oh, my God! I lost it when I was run after #b#o8160000##k. \r\n#b#L0#I'll find it.#l

Really? If you are strong enough to kill #r#o8160000##k, prove it. If you're successful, please bring me #b#t4031473##k. Then I'll send you to Thanatos's room in the Different World of the Distorted Corridor.
You don't like this method? Without #t4031473#, you can't see him!
Ah! You came here to see #b#t4031473##k! Good~ I almost lost track of time!
I'll let you in any room that you want! #b#m922020100##k is very dangerous so you'll need to party with two other Arch Mages to enter. When you're ready, talk to me again.
